# 04-three run in vue/微信小游戏

# 1. vue项目运行three的方法

  • 项目初始化
npm i vue-cli -g
vue init webpack demo
cd demo
npm i three -S
  • 组件的搭建

/components/Three-com.vue

<template>
  <div class="three-canvas"></div>
</template>

<script>
  //导入THREE
  import * as THREE from 'three'
  //导入three的控制模块
  import {OrbitControls} from 'three/examples/jsm/controls/OrbitControls'
  export default {
    name: 'ThreeCom',
    methods: {
      getCube () {
        this.geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry( 1, 2, 3)
        this.material = new THREE.MeshNormalMaterial()
        return new THREE.Mesh(this.geometry, this.material)
      },
      getCamera () {
        const camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(75, window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000)
        camera.position.z = 5
        return camera
      },
      init () {
        // render cube
        this.cube = this.getCube()
        this.scene = new THREE.Scene()
        //render camera
        this.camera = this.getCamera()
        this.renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer()
        this.renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight)
        document.querySelector('.three-canvas').appendChild( this.renderer.domElement )
        this.scene.add(this.cube)
        this.renderer.render(this.scene, this.camera)
        this.controls = new OrbitControls(this.camera, this.renderer.domElement)
      },
      animate () {
        requestAnimationFrame(this.animate)
        this.cube.rotation.x += 0.01
        this.cube.rotation.y += 0.01
        //渲染模型将场景,在相机视角渲染
        this.controls.update()
        this.renderer.render(this.scene, this.camera)
      },
    },
    mounted () {
      this.init()
      this.animate()
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>

# 2.微信小游戏运行three的方法

  • 项目初始化

    新建项目(按照小游戏初始化的方法来)

  • 导入npm包

npm init
npm i three -S

  • 构建小程序npm包

    工具 -> 构建npm

  • 在./js/main.js中构建(修改)代码

//导入three包
import * as THREE from "three"
//canvas是全局暴露的canvas对象, 获取webgl的执行上下文
let ctx = canvas.getContext("webgl")

export default class Main{
  constructor() {
    this.start()
  }
  
  start() {
    // 初始化
    this.scene = new THREE.Scene()
    this.geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(1, 2, 3)
    // 新建材质包
    this.material = new THREE.MeshNormalMaterial()
    // 模型材质混合, 构造网状体
    this.cube = new THREE.Mesh(this.geometry, this.material)
    this.scene.add(this.cube)
    
		// ctx执行上下文绘制
    this.renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ context: ctx })

    this.camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(45, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 1, 10000)
    this.camera.position.set(0, 0, 10)
    this.camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0)

    // 开始循环
    this.loop()
  }

  // UPDATE 更新
  update() {
    // ... 数据更新代码块 ...
    this.cube.rotation.x += 0.01
    this.cube.rotation.y += 0.01
  }

  // RENDER 渲染
  render() {
    // ... 渲染代码块 ...
    this.renderer.render(this.scene, this.camera)
  }

  // 实现游戏帧循环
  loop() {
    this.update()
    this.render()

    window.requestAnimationFrame(this.loop.bind(this))
  }
}

注意: 其中在小程序中没有健全的 dom接口, 比如 没有document.createElementNS方法.手动修改补全

  • 在./js/lib/weapp-adapter.js中构建(修改)代码
// line 687
var document = {
	  readyState: 'complete',
	  visibilityState: 'visible',
	  documentElement: window,
	  hidden: false,
	  style: {},
	  location: window.location,
	  ontouchstart: null,
	  ontouchmove: null,
	  ontouchend: null,

	  head: new _HTMLElement2.default('head'),
	  body: new _HTMLElement2.default('body'),

	  createElement: function createElement(tagName) {
	    if (tagName === 'canvas') {
	      return new _Canvas2.default()
	    } else if (tagName === 'audio') {
	      return new _Audio2.default()
	    } else if (tagName === 'img') {
	      return new _Image2.default()
	    }

	    return new _HTMLElement2.default(tagName)
	  },
  	/*****************添加代码****************/
    createElementNS: function createElementNS(nameSpace, tagName) {
      return this.createElement(tagName)
    },
    /*****************添加代码 end****************/
	  getElementById: function getElementById(id) {
	    if (id === window.canvas.id) {
	      return window.canvas
	    }
	    return null
	  },
	  getElementsByTagName: function getElementsByTagName(tagName) {
	    if (tagName === 'head') {
	      return [document.head]
	    } else if (tagName === 'body') {
	      return [document.body]
	    } else if (tagName === 'canvas') {
	      return [window.canvas]
	    }
	    return []
	  },
	  querySelector: function querySelector(query) {
	    if (query === 'head') {
	      return document.head
	    } else if (query === 'body') {
	      return document.body
	    } else if (query === 'canvas') {
	      return window.canvas
	    } else if (query === '#' + window.canvas.id) {
	      return window.canvas
	    }
	    return null
	  },
	  querySelectorAll: function querySelectorAll(query) {
	    if (query === 'head') {
	      return [document.head]
	    } else if (query === 'body') {
	      return [document.body]
	    } else if (query === 'canvas') {
	      return [window.canvas]
	    }
	    return []
	  },
	  addEventListener: function addEventListener(type, listener) {
	    if (!events[type]) {
	      events[type] = []
	    }
	    events[type].push(listener)
	  },
	  removeEventListener: function removeEventListener(type, listener) {
	    var listeners = events[type]

	    if (listeners && listeners.length > 0) {
	      for (var i = listeners.length; i--; i > 0) {
	        if (listeners[i] === listener) {
	          listeners.splice(i, 1)
	          break
	        }
	      }
	    }
	  },
	  dispatchEvent: function dispatchEvent(event) {
	    var listeners = events[event.type]

	    if (listeners) {
	      for (var i = 0; i < listeners.length; i++) {
	        listeners[i](event)
	      }
	    }
	  }
	}
